comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: does the metavault project or exchange not want to open it on other blockchain networks, maybe erc or bsc which is generally used by many people?it would be better to see the current situation so many new blockchains are popping up

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: Blowon on September 24, 2022, 07:17:50 PMdoes the metavault project or exchange not want to open it on other blockchain networks, maybe erc or bsc which is generally used by many people?it would be better to see the current situation so many new blockchains are popping upwhat do you mean by this? if you will check their app, you can for example easily swap USDT from ETH to Polygon network. see below snapshot. as you can see they have several networks that you can choose. though i haven't tried their app yet.

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: Quote from: AmoreJaz on September 25, 2022, 11:58:05 PMQuote from: Blowon on September 24, 2022, 07:17:50 PMdoes the metavault project or exchange not want to open it on other blockchain networks, maybe erc or bsc which is generally used by many people?it would be better to see the current situation so many new blockchains are popping upwhat do you mean by this? if you will check their app, you can for example easily swap USDT from ETH to Polygon network. see below snapshot. as you can see they have several networks that you can choose. though i haven't tried their app yet. sorry maybe I'm not detailed enough to see their daps, I think it only runs on polygon networks, thanks for your advice I'll take a look and try it soon explore more and learn about it

comments.author: r_victory
comments.body: Metavault.Trade is a new kind of Decentralized Exchange designed to provide a large range of trading features and very deep liquidity on many large-cap crypto assets.https://www.bloomberg.com/press-releases/2022-09-22/introducing-metavault-trade-the-next-generation-dex
